title: Potion (A Taste of Hope)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The potion is obtained during A Taste of Hope by using the mysterious herb with a vial of water, then adding mysterious crushed meat to the unfinished potion. It is to be used on the door in Serafina's home.

The potion is obtained during A Taste of Hope by using the mysterious herb with a vial of water, then adding mysterious crushed meat to the unfinished potion. It is to be used on the door in Serafina's home.

[[File:Potion (A Taste of Hope) detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''potion''' is obtained during [[A Taste of Hope]] by using the [[mysterious herb]] with a [[vial of water]], then adding [[mysterious crushed meat]] to the [[Unfinished potion (A Taste of Hope)|unfinished potion]]. It is to be used on the door in Serafina's home.
